articles.title: Twitter (X) Gains Unique 'Like' Animation for Today's Apple Event - MacRumors
articles.description: Twitter (now X) has added a unique "like" animation for Apple's "Wonderlust" event set to take place later on Tuesday.  Hit the...
articles.content:
Twitter (now X) has added a unique "like" animation for Apple's "Wonderlust" event set to take place later on Tuesday.
Hitting the Like button causes the logo to disperse into pieces, before changin… [+977 chars]
